entry.title: 20000mAh Power Bank Portable Charger With LED Display (2 Outputs 3 Inputs)
entry.summary:
Vendor: XpressTronics
Type: Miscellaneous
Price: 15.99

  • Large Battery Capacity: 20000mAh power bank can fully charge for iPhone XS 5 times, for Galaxy S9 3 times, for iPad mini 2+ times, with most phones you will get 3-5 full charges of your phone.
  • Advantages: The power banks have dual outputs (all is 5V, 2.1A), you can charge two devices at the same time. And the power banks have Triple inputs (all is 5V, 2A), whether you use an iOS or an Android phone with USB C or USB B, you only need to carry one cable. Portable charger with digital display, it can clearly tell you how much power left.
  • Smart System: The portable Power bank built-in smart chip, it can automatically detect the best charging speed for Android or for iPhone IOS cellphone or other USB port devices. With short circuit and overcurrent protection, when short circuit or overload output occurs, the device will automatically shut down to avoid equipment damage and accidents.

2 outputs
  • Double USB DC 5V-2.4A Max

Compatible Model
USB Type C QC Fast Charging External Battery for iPhone X Xs XR Xs Max 8 8plus Powerbank External Battery for Xiaomi Samsung Huawei External Battery for Phone Powerbank QC fast charge for MacBook Samsung Huawei Dell Asus laptop

entry.title: Solar Power Universal Power Bank - 24000mAh (DUAL USB PORT)
entry.summary:
Vendor: XpressTronics
Type: Miscellaneous
Price: 25.99

  • A universal solar charger that serves you as a power bank and Qi wireless charger
  • Designed to withstand various weather conditions, thanks to the water-resistant housing
  • The solar power bank/Qi wireless charger has the PD and QC3.0 for fast charging
  • The solar charger is equipped with one QC3.0 USB port, one 2A USB port, and a USB-C PD port
  • You can recharge up to four devices at the same time, one wirelessly and three via your cables
  • You can recharge the power bank by exposing it directly to sunlight or via Type-C/microUSB input
  • A built-in LED flashlight with 3 modes (normal/strobe/SOS) - ideal for emergency situations at night or in low-light conditions
  • 24000mAh battery capacity allows you to recharge your devices several times
  • This solar power bank/wireless charger is suitable for all Qi-enabled devices and all USB-powered phones, tablets, notebooks, etc.
